name: Akshay Saini
bio: Akshay Saini is a software engineer, educator, and the founder of NamasteDev. He is best known for his YouTube series 'Namaste JavaScript' and for creating detailed, beginner-friendly courses on React, Node.js, DSA, and Frontend System Design. Before founding NamasteDev, he worked as a Software Engineer at Uber.
teachingStyle: Explains complex frontend concepts through real-world analogies, storytelling, and in-depth coding examples
achievements: Founder of NamasteDev and creator of popular online tech courses
Creator of the viral YouTube series 'Namaste JavaScript'
Helped hundreds of thousands of students strengthen core web development skills
